```{r}
## Histograms
# Extracting the data---------------------------------------

query<-"SELECT weight
FROM Master"

result<-sqldf(query)

# visualize the data---------------------------------------------------

ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="pink",fill="white",bins=40)+
  ggtitle("Baseball Player Body-Weight Distribution")

```
